sentences.en: 12,000 motorists were stopped for speeding in the police crackdown.
sentences.cn: 在警方的这次整治行动中，有1.2万名汽车司机因超速被拦下。

sentences.en: A motorist must is able to read traffic signs.
sentences.cn: 机动车辆驾驶员必须能看懂交通标志.

sentences.en: He managed to flag down a passing motorist.
sentences.cn: 他挥手招呼一位过路的司机把车停下来.

sentences.en: He preferred a charge against the motorist.
sentences.cn: 他对这个驾驶汽车者提出控告.

sentences.en: I ran out of petrol, but a passing motorist saved the situation.
sentences.cn: 我的汽油用完了, 但是一辆路过的汽车司机救了我.

sentences.en: Police urged motorists to take extra care on the roads.
sentences.cn: 警方敦促汽车驾驶员们在路上要格外当心。

sentences.en: The accident was caused by the motorist's impatience.
sentences.cn: 这一事故是骑摩托车的人性急造成的.

sentences.en: The blame rests fairly and squarely on the shoulders of the motorist.
sentences.cn: 责任完全在开汽车的人身上.

sentences.en: The motorist decided to put into the next hotel for a meal.
sentences.cn: 车手决定开到下个旅店进餐.

sentences.en: The motorist enjoys an unobstructed view of the natural scenery as he drives across the bridge.
sentences.cn: 汽车驾驶员在开车过桥时,可以一览无余地观赏自然风光.

sentences.en: The motorist saw in his driving mirror that a police car was following him.
sentences.cn: 那位摩托车骑士从他的后视镜里看到一辆警车正跟着他.

sentences.en: The motorist stopped his car at the traffic lights.
sentences.cn: 汽车司机在交通指挥灯前停下了车.

sentences.en: The motorist was charged with failing to stop at a red light.
sentences.cn: 那位司机被指控闯红灯.

sentences.en: The policeman cautioned the motorist about his speed.
sentences.cn: 警察警告那个司机不要开得太快.

sentences.en: The policeman pulled up the motorist and asked to see his licence.
sentences.cn: 警察让那个开车的人停下来,要求看他的执照.

sentences.en: The speeding motorist was pinned to the ground by angry locals who took the law into their own hands until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的当地人以暴代法——将超速司机强行按在地上，直至警察赶来。
